quote: The generous support from Craft Beer Cares is huge for Art Against Knives.
author: Katy Dawe, Art Against Knives Director

quote: We'd like to say a huge thank you to Craft Beer Cares for choosing to support Mind through their first beer festival. Every penny raised will fund Mind's vital work.
author: Karen Bolton, Community Fundraising Manager for Mind

quote: From November through to March, the coldest months of the year, Hackney Winter Night Shelter opens its doors to the most vulnerable in our community. Any money raised would be of enormous benefit.
author: Christina Ball, Hackney Winter Night Shelter
